title: AI use in warfare: Anthropic rejects US demand for ‘unrestricted’ military access
summary_full: AI firm Anthropic is refusing Pentagon demands for unrestricted use of its technology, citing concerns over mass surveillance and autonomous weapons. This public dispute could cost the company its government contract. While open to negotiation, Anthropic warns the Defense Department's stance offers little progress on preventing misuse. Lawmakers criticize the Pentagon's handling of the situation.
